cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)

include(pico_sdk_import.cmake)

project(yubictl)

set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)

add_compile_definitions(
  USBD_PID=0x5053
  USBD_MANUFACTURER="@UTBDK"
  USBD_PRODUCT="YubiToucher"
  # Some rp2040 super mini boards may have trouble booting properly
	# due to bad componets used in the design.
  # PICO_XOSC_STARTUP_DELAY_MULTIPLIER=32
)

pico_sdk_init()

add_executable(yubictl
  main.c
)

pico_generate_pio_header(yubictl ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/ws2812.pio)

target_link_libraries(yubictl
  pico_stdlib pico_multicore pico_stdio_usb
  hardware_pio
)

pico_add_extra_outputs(yubictl)
